programme.title: Wildest Africa: Mount Kenya: African Heart of Ice
programme.desc: Mount Kenya soars over 5km into the air. It is the second highest mountain in Africa. At its summit, temperatures fluctuate from over 30 degrees celsius to below freezing.

programme.title: Wildest Indochina: Malaysia: Freaks of Nature
programme.desc: Malaysia is one of a handful of countries in the world described as mega-diverse. Malaysia's animals and plants have exploited every opportunity to carve out an existence and so have adapted to some very strange ways of life.

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Sahara: Life on the Edge
programme.desc: Watch Africa's Cape Coast that goes from the frigid waters of Cape Point to the sub-tropic seas of Kwazulu-Natal./After, see Africa's Dark Heart in the Congo which is seething with innumerable species./Last,learn about the largest desert in the world.

programme.title: Wildest Latin America: Patagonia: The Ends of the Earth
programme.desc: Patagonia is a place of extremes  of vast ice fields and snow-capped mountains; of windswept deserts, and violent oceans. Survival here means being tough enough to cope with brutal winters, and canny enough to exploit brief seasons of plenty.

programme.title: Australia's Wild Places: The Rainforest
programme.desc: Daintree National Park is a magical meeting of rainforest and reef, lying at the heart of the world heritage listed wet tropics of Queensland.

programme.title: Noah

programme.title: The Sentinel

programme.title: My Kitchen Rules Australia: Episode 23
programme.desc: In tonight's challenges back at Headquaters, teams must trust each other and then cook a dish that represents them.

programme.title: My Kitchen Rules Australia: Episode 24
programme.desc: Carly & Emily Vs Peter & Gary. Two teams go head to head in the sudden death cook-off. Their fight is personal and the score will be settled.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Elements Of Murder
programme.desc: There are several things that can suggest murder; jealousy, anger, poison. When everyday substances reveal hidden clues that break a homicide case, those substances become the elements of murder.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Fatal Error
programme.desc: Accidental deaths, suicides, disappearances, and fires; they're an everyday part of an insurance investigator's life. But cases shouldn't be taken at face value. Forensics has become a tool for exposing insurance fraud.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Deadly Target
programme.desc: Ballistics: A corpse is found with a gunshot wound to the head; the weapon lies next to the victim. It looks like suicide, but could it be murder? It's a question best solved by ballistics experts.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Fatal Abduction
programme.desc: Anytime, anywhere, people disappear, kidnapped from their daily routines. Predators always leave clues behind, but chasing them takes time, hampering investigators' attempts to solve these fatal abductions.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Web of Clues
programme.desc: Forensic Entomology: Bugs have roamed the earth for 250 million years, but their intimate association with death is just now coming to life.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: With the dining room transformed into an Italian bistro, all eight chefs learn that they will participate in the beloved blind taste test challenge, gelato edition. With two tables of 12 patrons, the chefs rush to see who finishes first.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The seven remaining chefs are called down to the dining room to discover two ice dancers performing a routine. Chef Ramsay explains ice dancing can be romantic, just as dessert can be. For their challenge they must cook an extraordinary dessert.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: In the first challenge, the final six chefs break through a case, retrieving a random ingredient they will have to cook with. The second challenge has each chef cooking with the same four ingredients. The third challenge is a surf and turf challenge.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The five chefs compete in Chef Ramsay's Taste It, Now Make It challenge, recreating his intricate eggs benedict dish. Later, the fish station struggles at dinner service, leaving the chef in charge of it in real danger of being sent home.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The chefs undertake a tableside challenge, creating dishes for esteemed brigades acting as judges. Later, elimination surprises everyone, including Chef Ramsay.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel makes the ultimate shop van out of a 1949 International milk truck.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel transforms a 1948 Packard into a street cruising led sled.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel let's loose on an abandoned 70's trike kit and works his magic to turn the naysayers into believers.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel takes on a 1923 C-Cab and a client with hoarder tendencies. Pulling out all the stops, Ian attempts to create a vintage style tow truck.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel transforms a mini-kit van into a crazy utility vehicle.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel takes on one of his biggest challenges yet as he tries to turn a Wild Cartoon drawing into a real life Hot Rod. Part 1 of 2.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: The group that attacked the Andromeda during the first Commonwealth charter signing returns to wreak more havoc.

programme.title: Andromeda: The Dark Backward
programme.desc: Trance runs through a number of different scenarios, trying to find one in which her crewmates don't die.

programme.title: Andromeda: The Risk-All Point
programme.desc: A more powerful Andromeda ship explodes due to likely sabotage, forcing Dylan's crew to save them.

programme.title: Andromeda: The Right Horse
programme.desc: Beka endangers both her crew and an entire planet when a former love shows up.

programme.title: Andromeda: What Happens to a Rev Deferred?
programme.desc: The Andromeda receives a cry for help from Rev Bam.

programme.title: Andromeda: Point of the Spear
programme.desc: After a Commonwealth planet is attacked by Pyrian pyroformers, Dylan is forced to fight to protect the new planet.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Long Way Home
programme.desc: 25-year-old Te Puke woman Judy Yorke was a devoted single mum who adored her kids. When she missed her daughter’s fourth birthday party, her family knew something was terribly wrong and reported her missing.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Little Boy Lost
programme.desc: In 1957, nine-year-old Peter Boland was on holiday having the time of his life on a remote farm in New Zealand when he simply vanished without a trace. Peter’s older brother Gavin Boland, a self-confessed sceptic, turns to Sensing Murder’s psychics.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Out of the Dark
programme.desc: Described as a brutal execution, 46-year-old grandmother Chattrice Maihi-Carroll was found naked, stabbed to death in her New Zealand home in 2008. There were multiple suspects and everything seemed resolved following the arrest of a neighbour.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Girl in The Ditch
programme.desc: When 12 year old Agnes Ali'iva'a drowned in a ditch in 1992, the police initially thought her death was accidental. It was four years before public and political pressure forced police to re-investigate her death.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Snowtown: Bodies in the Barrels
programme.desc: In 1999, eight bodies are found in six barrels filled with acid in a former bank vault in rural Snowtown, 50 kilometres north of Adelaide.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Butchered Boys
programme.desc: This episode revisits Adelaide's notorious Adelaide Family Murders case, where six young Adelaide men were murdered during the 1970s and '80s. The victims were found in random locations throughout the state, their bodies neatly cut into pieces.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Cop Killer: The Winchester Assassination
programme.desc: The highest ranking police officer in Australia to be murdered, Assistant Federal Police Commissioner Colin Winchester was shot twice in the head at point blank range as he was getting out of his car outside his Deakin home on 10 January 1989.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Devil Inside: John Ernest Cribb
programme.desc: A chilling investigation of John Ernest Cribb, who on August 11, 1978 broke into the home of the Connell's. On a winter’s afternoon, Valda Connell and her four-year-old son Damien arrived home after having collected ten-year-old Sally from school.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Michael Kanaan: Shoot to Kill
programme.desc: Michael Kanaan was an angry young man in a hurry to make a name for himself in Sydney’s underworld. But his volatile temper and penchant for violence soon led him to kill three men before he was finally captured in a wild shootout with Sydney police.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: As an emu plague descends upon Drovers Run, Claire is challenged by the demands of her newborn baby.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: Peter’s return to Drover’s Run during the naming ceremony of his and Claire’s baby daughter, leads to a very important decision.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: Meg is dedicating herself to her studies in order to prove herself at TAFE, and is thoroughly immersed in ‘Pride and Prejudice’. The misunderstandings of character that drive that classic echo through everyone’s dealings at Drovers Run.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: Becky and Jake use Stormcloud to set up a stud on Drovers, going into partnership with Claire and Tess for the use of their land and reputation. Claire finds it hard not to be involved, a horse stud has long been her dream.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: ALEX and NICK come to the rescue of an attractive woman ELLIE, when her car breaks down on a country road. Almost instantly they’re pitched into a competition to win her, and the lead shifts from one to the other as each shines with his own charm.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: Vince, keen on Claire, convinces her to nominate for the vacant position on the Gungellan Farmers Council. Tess volunteers herself as her campaign manager and speechwriter.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Tervita specializes in environmental clean-up for Western Canada’s booming energy and mining industries. It doesn’t take long for Fory Musser,

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Jane Riddell, chief operating officer of GoodLife Fitness, disguises herself as a Zumba-instructor trainee, a maintenance worker and a salesperson.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Mark King, the CEO of the world’s top golf equipment brand, Taylor Made, goes undercover as Al Bower, an unemployed golf enthusiast trying to land his dream job in the golf industry.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO John Tracogna goes undercover at Canada’s largest zoo to get up close and personal with endangered wildlife and the people that keep the organization running.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Lisa Lisson, the first female president of FedEx Express Canada, goes undercover to find out if her employees have the right resources to provide exceptional service in the fiercely competitive courier industry.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO Ellis Jacob goes undercover doling out snacks and tickets while assessing how to enhance the moviegoer experience within Canada’s largest motion picture exhibitor across the board.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Christmas Spirit
programme.desc: TAPS gets into the spirit with an investigation of Bethlehem, Pennsylvania.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Roller Ghoster
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters,TAPS heads to Ohio to investigate Kings Island, anamusement park that sits on land that was thesite of an awful accident.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Buyer Beware
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS heads to Naples, New York, to investigate the Naples Hotel.This hotel was built in 1895.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Flooded Souls
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS heads to Hales Bar Dam and Marina in Tennessee, to investigate a dam that was built on Native American land.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Dead & Breakfast
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS investigates a 19thcentury Bed and Breakfast in Red Boiling Springs, Tennessee, built by the Cloyd family.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Moonshine & Madness
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters: slavery, murder and madness are behind the hauntings at the notorious Graham Mansion. TAPS travels to Virginia to determine the true source of the claims that have taken place at this historical location.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Ice Man
programme.desc: Dog's latest fugitive doesn't think small when it comes to illegal drugs: he was carrying almost a pound of meth when he was arrested. Now he's on the run with his pregnant girlfriend on the high plains of Colorado.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Trouble in Paradise
programme.desc: Dog is back in Hawaii and tracking a dangerous fugitive through the jungles of the Big Island. Their prey is being protected by a ring of family and friends that Dog must forcefully confront to bring in his man.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Girl Power
programme.desc: When Dog decides to spend the day caring for his newest granddaughter, Beth enlists the girls to hunt down a female fugitive. Heading into a dangerous part of town the ladies will use their feminine wiles to track this mother gone wrong.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Prodigal Son
programme.desc: Dog and his old friends, Tim Chapman and Sonny Westbrook are riding with the team, so their target, a thief with violent tendencies, is out of luck. When Dog learns that the fugitive is also a disrespectful son, he is more motivated to find his man.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Family Ties
programme.desc: Dog doesn't have the whole team today and he's got to catch a fugitive with a record of criminal assault. But when Dog finds the fugitive's former girlfriend, she thinks he isn't dangerous at all.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Special Delivery
programme.desc: For months, this fugitive has been stringing Leland along with a series of barely believable excuses. Out of patience, Leland calls in the Big Dog. The whole team heads out to put pressure on the family and friends of the fugitive.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Surface Scratches
programme.desc: Dog's latest quarry is running from abuse and assault charges. As Dog investigates, he discovers that this fugitive has gamed the system by jumping from one bond, and one bondsman, to another.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Great Debate
programme.desc: When the co-signer of a bond is also romantically involved with the defendant, sometimes the bondman is put in the middle of a lover's quarrel.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Facebooked
programme.desc: Dog is in Denver helping Bobby Brown to track down a fugitive with a long rap sheet. But unfortunately they have no picture of the felon to work with, so the challenges are big on this one. But Dog discovers a new source; "Facebook".

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Inlawful Entry
programme.desc: When Missy's parents visit, her father convinces Jase to take him on a quail hunt. But while their "bonding hunt" yields very few quail, it does bring them closer together as friends. Meanwhile, Willie helps John Luke start his own snow cone business.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Flock and Key
programme.desc: Si recruits his nephews to help him transport a storage container to his backyard, but things take a turn when Jep becomes locked inside the box. Meanwhile, Jase helps Mia prepare for her cheerleading competition, but the only problem is he has no idea.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Ball in the Family
programme.desc: When Willie's old rival Phillip McMillan challenges him to a game of dodgeball, Willie recruits his family members to settle a score once and for all. Meanwhile, Si thinks his cat is cheating on him with another family, so he recruits Miss Kay.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Drone Survivor
programme.desc: When Jase and Phil make a bet about whether or not human beings in a duck blind are visible from the air, Jep buys a drone copter to get a "bird's eye" view, but ends up losing it in the process.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Alan in Charge
programme.desc: Jase and the guys convince Willie to hire his older brother Alan to work at Duck Commander, but when Alan begins micromanaging everyone, they quickly change their mind. Meanwhile, the ladies take a self-defense class and use John Luke as a punching bag.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Renaissance Men
programme.desc: When the Robertsons throw a Renaissance Fair birthday party for Godwin, various family members compete in a tournament to win knighthood.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Heroes Welcome
programme.desc: In this special episode, the Duck Commander team surprises two wounded veterans with a trip to Monroe so they can be in an episode of Duck Dynasty. To show their support, the Robertson family stages a color run to bring awareness to our wounded soldiers.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Pie Hard
programme.desc: Willie and Alan agree to help Miss Kay open her own bakery, but things take a turn when Kay is asked to hand over her secret recipes. Meanwhile, the guys in the duck call room take an extended lunch break by driving to Mississippi.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Van He'llsing
programme.desc: When Missy and Jase's son Reed purchases an old van to boost his music career, his parents begin to question some of his choices. Meanwhile, Willie helps Jep prepare River for a competitive wrestling league by introducing him to his friend.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Toad to Perdition
programme.desc: When Willie and his brothers spend too much time frog hunting, their wives challenge them to a "frogging" competition.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: RV There Yet?
programme.desc: The Robertson family takes a road trip to Liberty University where they will drop off John Luke and Mary Kate for their first year of college. Along the way, they stop in Nashville to visit Willie's friend Colt Ford.

programme.title: Drug Wars: The Rio Grande Smokescreen
programme.desc: Border Patrol in the Rio Grande Valley is on the hunt for illegal narcotics smuggled over from Mexico

programme.title: Drug Wars: Smuggler’s Cove
programme.desc: Border units are busy tracking down boats loaded with drugs and illegal aliens. In San Diego Bay a boat tries to blend in with the holiday crowd, but agents soon take notice of its extreme weight

programme.title: Drug Wars: The Walk to Freedom
programme.desc: Hundreds of migrants try to enter the US every day. Some are forced to work as drug mules, with many perishing during the harsh desert crossing.

programme.title: Drug Wars: Bricks in the Wall
programme.desc: Arrests spike along the border wall as residents of India and Pakistan leap over, right into the hands of the border patrol. Other teams investigate new smuggling tunnels

programme.title: Drug Wars: Joint Operations
programme.desc: For the first time, camera crews are allowed inside the Foreign Operations Branch Mission, a joint partnership between US authorities and Mexican Federales.

programme.title: Timber Kings: Weather or Not
programme.desc: Peter battles the elements to build a retirement home for childhood sweethearts, while Bryan Jr. constructs an entryway for his own sweetheart - wife Tabby.

programme.title: Timber Kings: Hometown Hero
programme.desc: Beat creates a cozy cabin in Germany, while Peter and Sr. win a Guinness World Record with their jaw-dropping one-of-a-kind log car, and Joel takes on a difficult build made even tougher with a rookie slinging logs.

programme.title: Timber Kings: Heaven’s Gate
programme.desc: Bryan Jr. feels the heat to recreate the cozy log home a British Columbia couple lost to a fire. Meanwhile, Peter hopes for a ticket to heaven by building a covered entrway for the local church.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Player of the Year
programme.desc: Jordan says that Taurean is the biggest player with the ladies and still decides to lie about it even after she gave him a chance to have an open relationship. He says he talks to other women because Jordan is unaffectionate and verbally abusive.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Poker Face
programme.desc: Tamika and Joseph have been together 7 years before marrying, but now his gambling addiction plus their new baby has worn the two out. Joseph’s excessive gambling habits are draining their life’s savings and he refuses to get the help he needs.

programme.title: Divorce Court: In and Out
programme.desc: Willard says he’s getting tired of this roller coaster ride of a relationship with Cynthia and he’s had just about as much as he can take with her lies and deception.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Sick and Tired
programme.desc: Timothy is tired of being kicked out the house every time Erin catches an attitude. If she kicks him out once more, he's gone for good. Erin says she dropped out of college and left behind a full tennis scholarship because of him.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Old Town Road
programme.desc: Jennifer says Josh's lies have left her and their family homeless. He has made many hurtful decisions like selling her car and dumping her dog while she was giving birth to their son. Can he pave the way for a future?

programme.title: Divorce Court: To the Left
programme.desc: This relationship between high school sweethearts has turned sour. Tonesha, though she converted to Islam for Theotis, says he still has a lot of growing up to do before they get married.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Grumpy Old Man
programme.desc: Michaela and Richard’s 30-year age difference has finally taken a toll on their relationship. Richard says he just wants to settle down and enjoy the rest of his life and says that Michaela’s constant nagging is making him rethink marrying her.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Once a Cheater Always a Cheater
programme.desc: Alyssia says Devonte is a serial cheater, but wants to save their relationship. He says she's insecure and stalks his social media. They share a child, but Devonte doesn't want to commit if she won't change. Can Judge Toler help them?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Uninvited Guest Part 1
programme.desc: Jacoby Garrett is fighting to save his marriage of 15 years. Meanwhile his wife, Kim Garrett has her belongings packed and is waiting on the moving truck.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Uninvited Guest Part 2
programme.desc: Jacoby says his wife has stolen money to feed her gambling addiction. Kim says that his mother is a huge thorn in her side. In 15 years, Kim says she is still scratching her head as to why Jacoby’s mother bad mouths her to everyone.

programme.title: Divorce Court: King of Kings
programme.desc: Joel claims he is a king looking for his queen. He says that him and Jerrica would succeed if she would just fall in line in his kingdom. Jerrica says she can no longer accept Joel’s list of rules and take his verbal abuse. She is ready to walk away.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Pour Up Drank
programme.desc: Floyd Steven’s jealousy is leading Alqueisha “Quey” Benjamin to consider breaking it off. Quey is becoming an alcoholic because of his controlling ways, but Floyd has caught her in a few lies and suspects her of cheating!

programme.title: Operation Repo: Raising the Roof
programme.desc: Sonia and Froy deal with an unbalanced debtor who threatens to take down the entire company, while Matt and Ronnie take on children's book vendors who are up to no good.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Revenge
programme.desc: Matt and Froy take the opportunity to enact revenge on Ronnie and Carlos; a repo at a car wash gets out of hand; Lou's big mistake on a repo results in a debtor bringing the fight to their front door in a shootout.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Gypsy Hunter
programme.desc: Reeling from the shootout, Lou tracks down one of the culprits and enacts an elaborate plot of revenge with the help of Froy and Carlos.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Gypsy Barbeque!
programme.desc: When Matt and Froy repo a car from an anger management meeting, Froy suffers the consequences of taking on a violent rage-aholic.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Up in Flames
programme.desc: A jazz musician sets off Sonia and punches are thrown as Ronnie tries to manage the mayhem, and Matt and Sonia wrestle to bring deluded actors back to reality.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Gypsy Games
programme.desc: When Rusty leads Sonia and Ronnie on a wild goose chase, Sonia loses her cool and puts her foot down with Lou.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Ties That Bind
programme.desc: With Duane Lee back on the team, the rift in the Chapman clan appears over. But will time heal this wound? As the family heads out for the seedier side of Honolulu in search of an erotic dancer, we will find out if the wound is truly healed.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Who's the Boss
programme.desc: When can a bounty hunt also be a date? When Dog and Beth decide to ride in the same SUV as they pursue a run away fugitive, will their different approaches to the investigation lead to a capture and romance?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bus Stop Bruiser
programme.desc: When an alleged abuser goes on the lame, Dog gathers the team to bring him in. As the leads grow colder Dog's determination only grows stronger. Finally, a hot lead comes in and Dog sets the trap for his prey.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Luck Be A Lady
programme.desc: Dog and company head to the Big Island in pursuit of two courthouse no-shows only to find that one of them appears to be posting status updates from Southern California.

programme.title: The Game: Skeletons
programme.desc: In the fifth season premiere, Melanie contends with Derwin's abortion accusation by leading him to believe he was the father of a child she terminated in college.

programme.title: The Game: Truth Pact
programme.desc: In the second half of the fifth season opener, Melanie reveals a huge confession to Derwin regarding the abortion that he assumed was of their child.

programme.title: The Game: No Money Mo Problems
programme.desc: Melanie feels like something is missing in her life after Derwin goes back to Irv as his manager.

programme.title: The Game: The Black People Episode
programme.desc: Melanie and Tasha's feud finds a public forum while preparing for the annual Sunbeams fashion show.

programme.title: The Game: Grand Opening, Grand Closing
programme.desc: Jason's ego takes a hit when Chardonnay rejects his proposal about hooking up after their upcoming annulment.

programme.title: Run's House: Vegas Vacation
programme.desc: Rev has a shoe convention to attend in Las Vegas and takes the family with him. Rev enlists help from Vanessa and Angela to plan a surprise for Justine.

programme.title: Run's House: Rev's Fix It List
programme.desc: Some of Rev's husbandly habits are wearing thin on Justine and leaving her feeling disrespected. Rev is shocked to hear that there are a "few" things to improve and challenges Justine to make a list.

programme.title: Run's House: Rev Mom

programme.title: Run's House: Anger Management
programme.desc: Mom and Dad express concern over Russy's temper and decide to get professional help.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Man of the House

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Anniversary
programme.desc: Ever since a close-knit Kentucky family moved into their new home, they've been visited by the spirit of a young girl.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Southern Discomfort At Sweetwater Mansion
programme.desc: PRS heads to the Deep South to investigate a haunted Antebellum Mansion in disrepair. The caretaker and volunteers at the property have many a tale to tell of paranormal activity.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Haunted Connection
programme.desc: P.R.S. is called in to help a young mother tormented by an otherworldly connection to a teenage girl murdered in her neighborhood years ago. Could she have psychic ability or is there a more sinister force at work?

programme.title: Paranormal State: If I Should Die...
programme.desc: Proven paranormal investigator Ken Arrington leads a new class of characters as they try to help a family cope with what appears to be a demonic spirit in their home.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Do Bad Things
programme.desc: After receiving a letter requesting PRS' help, Ryan and the team head to Ohio to help a grieving family and determine if the family's house contributed to the untimely death of a daughter.

programme.title: Paranormal State: They Only Come Out at Night
programme.desc: Once night falls in a quaint?New England Town, a police officer's family is terrorized by demons.?PRS arrives just in time with the family ready to vacate their family home, rather than suffer the advances of these spirit creatures.

programme.title: Leopard Inn Pt 2

programme.title: Leopard Inn Pt 3

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! MOST HAUNTED

programme.title: Arthur: D.W.'s Time Trouble/Buster's Amish Mismatch
programme.desc: D.W. is tired of being bossed around all the time and demands to know why she couldn't have been born before Arthur! And during a trip to Amish country, Buster becomes enamored with the simple life and vows to forgo modern conveniences.

programme.title: Arthur: Follow the Bouncing Ball/Buster Baxter and the Letter from the Sea
programme.desc: Alberto Molina's beloved soccer ball--signed by his favorite Ecuadorian soccer star --is lost! While on vacation, Buster discovers a message in a bottle on the shore. Could it be a message from the people of the lost city of Atlantis?

programme.title: Arthur: D.W.'S Library Card/Arthur's Big Hit
programme.desc: When D.W. discovers that she can get her own library card, she rejoices at the world of books waiting for her. And, is it ever okay to hit someone? Sometimes you just get so mad, you wanna....pow! Right??

programme.title: Arthur: Silent Treatment/Kung Fool
programme.desc: When shy George wonders if any of his friends notice him, he decides he won’t speak to anyone until they do! Fern volunteers to help an elderly neighbor with his household chores, and then discovers his past life as a Kung Fu celebrity.

programme.title: Arthur: D.W., All Fired Up/I'd Rather Read It Myself
programme.desc: When Ms. Morgan announces they'll be having a fire drill during preschool, D.W. wants no part of it--it sounds way too scary. Then, the Tibble Twins are better than D.W. at just about everything.

programme.title: Arthur: Lost!/The Short, Quick Summer
programme.desc: One day, Arthur falls asleep on a bus and awakens in a strange part of town. Will he ever find his way home? Can he keep himself from crying? Next, summer vacation is over? What about all those great, fun things Arthur intended to do?

programme.title: Arthur: What Is That Thing?/Buster's Best Behavior
programme.desc: Arthur and friends are all faced with seemingly impossible tasks, from fixing a model biplane to babysitting D.W. And, Buster knows he's fun, but he's beginning to feel like he's not particularly good at anything.

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur's Snow Biz/Bugged
programme.desc: Winter hits Elwood City and Arthur sees dollar signs! His snow-shoveling business is booming--that is, until Buster decides to get in on the action. And, Brain can be a know-it-all, and sometimes he really bugs people.

programme.title: Arthur: Francine's Pilfered Paper/Buster Gets Real
programme.desc: When Francine has a big paper over Thanksgiving, she copies from a website. There's nothing wrong with that, is there? Everyone loves the new Top Supermarket reality series on TV, except Arthur. Will it end his friendship with Buster?

programme.title: The Blitz
programme.desc: The Blitz looks at the build-up to the raids and detailed footage of the destruction that followed. It features interviews from those who lived through it and stories of sadness and bravery, at a time when Britain held strong and swore not to surrender.

programme.title: NEW: The Siege of Malta
programme.desc: At last here is the definitive story of heroism and hardship of a people uniquely and collectively awarded the George Cross 'for gallantry', and told by some of the heroic survivors.

programme.title: VE Day - Forever in their Debt
programme.desc: Tells the stories of those who experienced the end of the war in all its many forms. It features a wide range of interviews from children who remember the street parties, to the servicemen who remember not having to buy a single drink that day.

programme.title: Voices of D-Day Landings
programme.desc: In the early hours of June 6th, 1944 Allied forces began the greatest military assault ever attempted. They came to Normandy by both air and sea with one objective.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Long Islander Catherine has fallen deeply in love with country boy Graham from Tennessee. She's ready to uproot her life to be a country girl with him, but Nev and Max uncover that Graham's not everything he claims to be.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Miracle & Javonni
programme.desc: Smart, single mum Miracle fell for Javonni, a dreamy-eyed Instagrammer. With Max on hiatus, Nev teams up with TV personality Charlamagne to take Miracle on a hunt for the man of her dreams.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Kya & Alyx
programme.desc: In this episode we meet Kya and Alyx, who fell in love quickly after meeting online. Are they being honest with each other? Hosts Nev Schulman and Max Joseph investigate. (S1, ep6)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Jesse & Brian
programme.desc: Jesse met Brian online. They made plans to meet, but Brian stood her up. Now, years later, Brian has asked her to live with him. But, she can't stop wondering - what is Brian hiding? (S2, ep8)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Lucille & Kidd Cole
programme.desc: Lucille led a simple life until she was asked to work for music producer Kidd Cole. Companies were never paid and one day Kidd couldn't be found. Will she get the answers she needs?

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Stephanie & David
programme.desc: Catfish brings together couples who've interacted solely through screens. In this edition, Stephanie searches for the man she's been talking to in an unseen episode.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Danny is intent on building a life with his online love, despite her violent past. But when he enlists Nev and Max to help him meet her, they discover she may have ties to a former Catfish! (S6, ep3)

programme.title: Celebrity Ex on the Beach: Theo's 'Down Under' Dilemma
programme.desc: Theo is left devastated after Kaz's departure and his relationship with KC comes to a head. Lockie and Sofie fall out and a new ex ruffles some feathers! (S2, ep9)

programme.title: Celebrity Ex on the Beach: The Cherry On The Cake
programme.desc: Anya fancies Kori, but is Kori over Sofie? A new celeb tickles someone's fancy, the OG's of the villa have a tough decision to make and a Gay Pride party reveals a surprise pot of gold. (S2, ep10)

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 221
programme.desc: Lauren is ready to let Daren, her best friend that she likes him. Juan will take the leap and confess to his best friend that he wants to date her.

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 216
programme.desc: Justice has a second chance to ask out his friend Kayla. Andrew will finally confess his feelings to his best friend, Liz.

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 210
programme.desc: DJ Danny tells his best friend Sabra about his true feelings. Travis reveals his secret crush to his best friend Kelly.

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 108
programme.desc: Angelica attempts to steal her best friend John away from his current girlfriend. Shivani reveals her true feelings to BFF Parth.

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 111
programme.desc: Stephanie is tired of only fantasizing about Mike's "sexy face" and she's ready to make him her boyfriend. Sean and Kate were friends at first sight, now Sean wants to up the stakes.

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 207
programme.desc: Amy tells her study partner and best friend that she's in love. Tonee wants to come clean with his feelings for his best friend Ryan.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Deadly Ride
programme.desc: Jane Mixer, a student at the University of Michigan Law School in March of 1969, had just agreed to get married and had arranged a ride home to tell her parents. Her body was found in a small, rural cemetery just miles from her dorm.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Fatal Attraction
programme.desc: Thomas Capano, a successful Delaware lawyer lived a double life, a devoted family man while having affairs. When Anne Marie Fahey, one of these women, mysteriously disappeared police were at first stumped. Finally evidence led to Capano.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Ambushed
programme.desc: A man helps a new detective figure out who murdered his father.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Reasonable Doubt
programme.desc: In September 1999, Brian Eftenoff of Phoenix, Az. Was convicted of murdering his wife, Judi. It was alleged that Eftenoff forced more than a gram of cocaine down his wife’s throat causing her to die of a cocaine-induced stroke.

programme.title: 48 Hours: A Daughter, A Mortgage, and Two Murders
programme.desc: A report on the investigation into the murders of Greg and Bernadette Ohlemacher in 2005. The Albuquerque, New Mexico couple had been shot dead in their home

programme.title: 48 Hours: Murder in the Fast Lane
programme.desc: A report on the March 1988 murder of legendary racecar driver Mickey Thompson and his wife Trudy. Thompson’s sister is convinced that Michael Goodwin, her brother’s former partner, was the killer.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: Stone Pillow
programme.desc: Guest star Bradford Dillman plays Edison, a former private detective turned extortionist who is blackmailing a powerful crime chief with a roll of film linking him to murder.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: Image
programme.desc: Barney assumes the identity of a powerful psychic from a Caribbean island kingdom in order to hypnotize a defecting crime syndicate leader into revealing his super secret list of government officials on the take.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: Committed
programme.desc: Nora Dawson, a witness to a murder, is committed to an asylum and is being systematically driven out of her mind with drugs when the IMF team is given twenty-four hours to save her life.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: Bag Woman
programme.desc: Posing as a bag woman for a crooked politician, Casey unknowingly carries an attached case locked to her wrist filled with both money and a bomb set to explode upon opening.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: Double Dead
programme.desc: Gangsters running a loan-shark racket in Hawaii short-circuit the IMF team's investigation when they capture Willy and feed him gigantic doses of truth serum.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Squares, Squares Everywhere
programme.desc: Nick's homework is to find as many squares as he can. It's great fun when Barney and the kids help!

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Best In Show - Ducks And Fish
programme.desc: When the kids decide to have a Dog Show to show off their pets, BJ feels a little left out. He doesn't have a dog, and he sure wishes he did! A friend from the park shares her dog with BJ so he can join in the fun.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: My Friends the Doctor
programme.desc: Time for a check-up! Barney helps his friends discover the world of doctors and dentists as they learn about healthy habits like brushing teeth, getting checkups, eating healthy foods and getting exercise.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Let's Go For A Ride!
programme.desc: Barney and the children have fun playing with and learning about busses and cars.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: A New Friend
programme.desc: While Barney has fun with his friends every day, there's something special about making a brand NEW friend! When Mr. Boyd's niece, Colleen visits the park, she's eager to make friends with the other kids...but being the "new kid" isn't easy.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: BJ sings that he wants to be a rock and roll star. Baby Bop sings that she wants to be a country music star. BJ gets mistaken for the artist who painted a portrait of Barney.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: It's Your Birthday, Barney
programme.desc: Every day with Barney is fun—but today is extra special. It's Barney's birthday!

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Splish! Splash!
programme.desc: A "too hot" afternoon becomes a "totally cool" day when Barney introduces his friends to the wonders of water.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Hula Moola
programme.desc: Ton and Allen jet to the Hawaiian islands where they're joined by a feisty new female assistant! The team uncovers a pair of James Bond-style gadgets designed for high-speed underwater travel and a vintage sled.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Drumming Up Cash
programme.desc: Ton & Allen face some silent but deadly competition at an auction in nearby Glendale. They discover a Zildjian brand percussion cymbal from the 1940's and a pyrotechnics control board designed for large-scale fireworks displays!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Great American Cashtime
programme.desc: Rare 1950s Master Pitch baseball machine; 1980s Jaws of Life tool used by rescuers to pry open cars.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Haff-Inated
programme.desc: Allen's off his game without his morning coffee, but some fun items help him re-energize. The guys find a wrestling ring, and when Allen uncovers vintage animatronics, they remind him of his days as a theme park boat captain.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Ice, Ice, Baby
programme.desc: Ton and Allen have to get aggressive when they encounter a towering opponent with a mountain of cash. The guys uncover a vintage ice resurfacing machine and an Olympic biathlon rifle!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Half Pipe Dreams
programme.desc: 1970s Z-Flex Jimmy Plumer Poolrider skateboard with artwork by Doug Smith; Kevlar bulletproof vest, ballistic facemask and a helmet used by S.W.A.T. teams; a pair of 1990s racing pocket bikes capable of going 80 mph.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Rodeo Ton
programme.desc: 1970s El Toro mechanical bull used to train bull riders; silver WWII era banjo; a collection of 1800s handcrafted hunting duck decoys.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Whip It Good
programme.desc: With a motocross bike and a rare stock whip up for grabs, Ton and Allen face one of their toughest competitors yet: their former employee Carolyn, who knows all their tricks, has money to burn and is out for revenge.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: You Got Served
programme.desc: After a crushing defeat, the guys leave an auction empty handed and scramble to find new merchandise at a yard sale. But questionable antique tennis rackets and an ancient special effects box may not earn them a cent.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Pucks for Bucks
programme.desc: The guys get stuck with a unit they didn't want and have to sort through trash to make their bottom line. They uncover glass blowing tools, autographed baseballs and a hockey puck launcher, which puts Ton in the line of fire.

programme.title: The Christmas Switch
programme.desc: Through Eddie's wit and guile, he gives Sam that last night and finally finds the real meaning of Christmas the gambler's way.

programme.title: Christmas In The City
programme.desc: After closing down her family business, Wendy and her daughter move to the city for a job in the toy department. Her excitement is short lived when the store's consultant ruins the holiday spirit by replacing Santa with a male underwear model.

programme.title: A Christmas Princess
programme.desc: A prince from Europe comes to New York for a royal holiday dinner and falls in love with the chef that is planning the event.

programme.title: Holiday Joy
programme.desc: A shy high school student's Christmas wish comes true only it isn't exactly as wonderful as she'd hoped.

programme.title: Teen Mom OG
programme.desc: Ryan is furious at Maci when she shows up late to trick-or-treat. Farrah is shocked when she finds out who Deb invited to her wedding. Catelynn surprises her family with her pregnancy. (S7, ep11)

programme.title: Teen Mom OG
programme.desc: Amber has big news for Leah. Catelynn spends quality time with Nova while Tyler gets emotional dropping Butch off at rehab. Maci and Taylor attend Ryan and Mackenzie's wedding. (S7, ep12)

programme.title: Teen Mom OG
programme.desc: Gary gets a paternity test to find out if Jody is his father. Maci talks to a doctor about her Polycystic Ovary Syndrome. Executive Producer Morgan heads to Austin to see Farrah. (S7, ep13)

programme.title: Teen Mom 2: Pushing the Limit
programme.desc: Jenelle asks to move in with Barbara, Chelsea's dad continues to put the pressure on her, Kailyn starts dating her ex and Leah tries to get some answers about Ali's condition.

programme.title: Teen Mom 2: Slippery Slope
programme.desc: Jo confronts Kailyn about dating Jordan, Leah continues planning for her wedding, Jenelle and Kieffer hatch a plan to run off and things between Chelsea and Adam go downhill.

programme.title: Teen Mom 2: Two Steps Forward
programme.desc: Things between Leah and Corey turn ugly, Chelsea decides to celebrate her break-up, Jenelle's plans start to crumble and Kailyn settles into life at her mum's house.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Nothing for Something
programme.desc: The CSIs investigate a woman's death as the work of a serial killer. Mac reconnects with his first partner after an ex-con begins stalking him.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Life Sentence
programme.desc: After a hail of gunfire tears through the crime lab, Mac and his ex-partner become part of a vendetta 17 years in the making.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Exit Strategy
programme.desc: Following a near-death experience, Detective Mac Taylor becomes quite determined to close his last remaining unsolved case.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: The team use the art of interrogation when a beloved off-duty NYPD officer dies.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: The team investigates when a masked man is found at the bottom of a skyscraper.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: The team investigate what appears to be a fatal car-jacking.

programme.title: CSI: Miami: Die By Sword
programme.desc: The bizarre case of a man chopped in half baffles the Horatio and the CSI team, while Natalia's injury puts her and Ryan in jeopardy.

programme.title: CSI: Miami: In the Wind
programme.desc: Horatio and the CSI team have 24 hours to find out if a man on death row is truly guilty, and Eric Delko returns to work the case.

programme.title: CSI: Miami: Miami, We Have a Problem
programme.desc: Horatio Caine and the CSI team solve the murder of a man who was killed in outer space before returning his body to beautiful Miami.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: The team are called to a fashion boutique when a young girl is killed in an explosion.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A baby is snatched from her mother's arms by a professional kidnapper.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When a shooter targets where Delko is staying, Horatio has to look into Delko's past.

programme.title: Ice Cold Killers: Slaying Season
programme.desc: When a single mother misses a routine bank run with her sister, panic begins to spread. The family’s nightmare becomes a reality when a passerby finds the woman assaulted and frozen in an alley.

programme.title: Sins & Secrets: Farmington Hills
programme.desc: In 2004 the grisly murder of automotive executive Bob Seaman would unveil a dark side the white collar community of Farmington Hills Michigan.

programme.title: Sins & Secrets: Carthage
programme.desc: Widow Marjorie Nugent was a recluse renown to nearly everyone in Carthage. So much so, that when she vanished in 1997, no one seemed to notice.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Rearview Mirror
programme.desc: When a retired military man runs over a pedestrian, it’s up to Lt. Joe Kenda to determine if it was bad brakes or bad intent.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Raise the Dead
programme.desc: When a tip comes in suggesting foul play on a 71yr old man, Lt. Joe Kenda is left with only one way to reveal the truth: exhume the body from its grave.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Eyes of a Child
